description: Sum{d(i)-d(i-1): d(i)>d(i-1), i=1,...,m}, where Sum{d(i)*7^i: i=0,1,...,m} is base 7 representation of n.
maple: A037857 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,7);    for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)>op(i-1,dgs) then            a := a+op(i,dgs)-op(i-1,dgs) ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
